db:info.db:title: QGenericMatrix Class
db:info.db:subtitle: template <int N, int M, typename T> class QGenericMatrix

db:abstract.db:para: The QGenericMatrix class is a template class that represents a NxM transformation matrix with N columns and M rows.

db:listitem.db:para: QGenericMatrix is part of Painting ClassesRendering in 3D

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QGenericMatrix template has three parameters:

db:td.db:para: Element type that is visible to users of the class.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix::QGenericMatrix()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a NxM identity matrix.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QGenericMatrix::QGenericMatrix(const T *values)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a matrix from the given N * M floating-point values. The contents of the array values is assumed to be in row-major order.

db:section.db:title: const T *QGenericMatrix::constData() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a constant pointer to the raw data of this matrix.

db:section.db:title: void QGenericMatrix::copyDataTo(T *values) const
db:section.db:para: Retrieves the N * M items in this matrix and copies them to values in row-major order.

db:section.db:title: T *QGenericMatrix::data()
db:section.db:para: Returns a pointer to the raw data of this matrix.

db:section.db:title: const T *QGenericMatrix::data() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a constant pointer to the raw data of this matrix.

db:section.db:title: void QGenericMatrix::fill(T value)
db:section.db:para: Fills all elements of this matrix with value.

db:section.db:title: bool QGenericMatrix::isIdentity() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this matrix is the identity; false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: void QGenericMatrix::setToIdentity()
db:section.db:para: Sets this matrix to the identity.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<M, N, T> QGenericMatrix::transposed() const
db:section.db:para: Returns this matrix, transposed about its diagonal.

db:section.db:title: bool QGenericMatrix::operator!=(const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this matrix is not identical to other; false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: T &QGenericMatrix::operator()(int row, int column)
db:section.db:para: Returns a reference to the element at position (row, column) in this matrix so that the element can be assigned to.

db:section.db:title: const T &QGenericMatrix::operator()(int row, int column) const
db:section.db:para: Returns a constant reference to the element at position (row, column) in this matrix.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &QGenericMatrix::operator*=(T factor)
db:section.db:para: Multiplies all elements of this matrix by factor.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &QGenericMatrix::operator+=(const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &other)
db:section.db:para: Adds the contents of other to this matrix.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &QGenericMatrix::operator-=(const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &other)
db:section.db:para: Subtracts the contents of other from this matrix.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &QGenericMatrix::operator/=(T divisor)
db:section.db:para: Divides all elements of this matrix by divisor.

db:section.db:title: bool QGenericMatrix::operator==(const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this matrix is identical to other; false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix2x2
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix2x2 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 2 columns, 2 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix2x3
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix2x3 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 2 columns, 3 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix2x4
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix2x4 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 2 columns, 4 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix3x2
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix3x2 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 3 columns, 2 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix3x3
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix3x3 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 3 columns, 3 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix3x4
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix3x4 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 3 columns, 4 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix4x2
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix4x2 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 4 columns, 2 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QMatrix4x3
db:section.db:para: The QMatrix4x3 type defines a convenient instantiation of the QGenericMatrix template for 4 columns, 3 rows, and float as the element type.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> operator*(T factor, const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &matrix)
db:section.db:para: Returns the result of multiplying all elements of matrix by factor.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<M1, M2, TT> operator*(const QGenericMatrix<NN, M2, TT> &m1, const QGenericMatrix<M1, NN, TT> &m2)
db:section.db:para: Returns the product of the NNxM2 matrix m1 and the M1xNN matrix m2 to produce a M1xM2 matrix result.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> operator*(const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &matrix, T factor)
db:section.db:para: Returns the result of multiplying all elements of matrix by factor.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> operator+(const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &m1, const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &m2)
db:section.db:para: Returns the sum of m1 and m2.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> operator-(const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &m1, const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &m2)
db:section.db:para: Returns the difference of m1 and m2.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> operator-(const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &matrix)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Returns the negation of matrix.

db:section.db:title: QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> operator/(const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &matrix, T divisor)
db:section.db:para: Returns the result of dividing all elements of matrix by divisor.

db:section.db:title: QDataStream &operator<<(QDataStream &stream, const QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &matrix)
db:section.db:para: Writes the given matrix to the given stream and returns a reference to the stream.

db:section.db:title: QDataStream &operator>>(QDataStream &stream, QGenericMatrix<N, M, T> &matrix)
db:section.db:para: Reads a NxM matrix from the given stream into the given matrix and returns a reference to the stream.
